name: cloudflareimgbed
title: CloudFlareImgbed
description: Raycast extension for managing CloudFlare ImgBed uploads, listing, and clipboard sharing.
author: shiyu46416

commands.name: gallery
commands.title: Browse ImgBed
commands.subtitle: CloudFlareImgbed
commands.description: View, filter, and manage CloudFlare ImgBed inside Raycast

commands.name: upload
commands.title: Upload Images
commands.subtitle: CloudFlareImgbed
commands.description: Choose local images, upload them to CloudFlare ImgBed, then copy the generated links

commands.name: upload-from-clipboard
commands.title: Upload from Clipboard
commands.subtitle: CloudFlareImgbed
commands.description: Detect clipboard images or links and upload them

preferences.name: apiBaseUrl
preferences.title: API Base URL
preferences.description: CloudFlare ImgBed deployment URL, such as https://imgbed.example.com

preferences.name: defaultDir
preferences.title: Default Directory
preferences.description: Directory used by default when listing images

preferences.name: defaultChannel
preferences.title: Default Channel (telegram/cfr2/s3)
preferences.description: Channel used for filtering and uploading when no override is provided

preferences.name: pageSize
preferences.title: Items Per Fetch
preferences.description: count parameter for the list command; recommended range 10-100

preferences.name: uploadChannel
preferences.title: Upload Channel
preferences.description: Default channel for the upload endpoint (telegram/cfr2/s3)

preferences.name: uploadFolder
preferences.title: Default Upload Folder
preferences.description: Relative folder appended during upload, e.g. img/test

preferences.name: uploadNameType
preferences.title: Naming Strategy (default/index/origin/short)
preferences.description: uploadNameType parameter passed to the upload endpoint

preferences.name: returnFormat
preferences.title: Link Format (default/full)
preferences.description: default returns /file/xxx, full returns the complete URL

preferences.name: serverCompress
preferences.label: Enable compression for Telegram channel
preferences.description: Only applied when the channel is Telegram

preferences.name: autoRetry
preferences.label: Retry with different channel on failure
preferences.description: Attempt other channels when the upload fails

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
